/*PaymentDistSearchMapper.getChargeDiscountInfoList*/
SELECT A.SO_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.PYM_ACNT_ID /* 납부계정ID */ , (SELECT ACNT_NM FROM TCMCU_PYM_ACNT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND PYM_ACNT_ID = A.PYM_ACNT_ID) AS ACNT_NM /* 납부계정명 */ , A.CUST_ID /* 고객ID */ , (SELECT CUST_NM FROM TCMCU_CUST_INFO WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID) AS CUST_NM /* 고객명 */ , A.CTRT_ID /* 계약ID */ , (SELECT SVC_TEL_NO FROM TCMCT_CTRT_INFO WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND CTRT_ID = A.CTRT_ID AND INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959') AS SVC_TEL_NO /* 서비스번호 */ , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TCMCT_CTRT_INFO B ,TPMPD_PROD C WHERE B.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND B.CTRT_ID = A.CTRT_ID AND B.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' AND B.PROD_CD = C.PROD_CD) AS PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ , SUM(A.USE_AMT) AS TOT_USE_AMT /* 이용금액 */ , SUM(A.DC_AMT) AS TOT_DC_AMT /* 할인금액 */ FROM ( SELECT A.SO_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , B.CHRG_CTGRY , CASE WHEN B.CHRG_CTGRY <> 'D' THEN SUM(A.USE_AMT) ELSE 0 END AS USE_AMT , CASE WHEN B.CHRG_CTGRY = 'D' THEN SUM(A.USE_AMT) ELSE 0 END AS DC_AMT FROM TBLCH_CHRG A ,TPMPD_RATE_ITM B WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} /*INPUT*/
AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{pymAcntId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD GROUP BY A.SO_ID, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.CTRT_ID, B.CHRG_CTGRY ) A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.SO_ID, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.CTRT_ID ORDER BY A.CTRT_ID

/*PaymentDistSearchMapper.totalCount*/ SELECT COUNT(TT.CUST_ID) FROM (SELECT A.SO_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.PYM_ACNT_ID /* 납부계정ID */ , (SELECT ACNT_NM FROM TCMCU_PYM_ACNT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND PYM_ACNT_ID = A.PYM_ACNT_ID) AS ACNT_NM /* 납부계정명 */ , A.CUST_ID /* 고객ID */ , (SELECT CUST_NM FROM TCMCU_CUST_INFO WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND CUST_ID = A.CUST_ID) AS CUST_NM /* 고객명 */ , A.CTRT_ID /* 계약ID */ , (SELECT SVC_TEL_NO FROM TCMCT_CTRT_INFO WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND CTRT_ID = A.CTRT_ID AND INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959') AS SVC_TEL_NO /* 서비스번호 */ , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TCMCT_CTRT_INFO B ,TPMPD_PROD C WHERE B.SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND B.CTRT_ID = A.CTRT_ID AND B.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' AND B.PROD_CD = C.PROD_CD) AS PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ , SUM(A.USE_AMT) AS TOT_USE_AMT /* 이용금액 */ , SUM(A.DC_AMT) AS TOT_DC_AMT /* 할인금액 */ FROM ( SELECT A.SO_ID , A.BILL_YYMM , A.BILL_CYCL , A.PYM_ACNT_ID , A.CUST_ID , A.CTRT_ID , B.CHRG_CTGRY , CASE WHEN B.CHRG_CTGRY <> 'D' THEN SUM(A.USE_AMT) ELSE 0 END AS USE_AMT , CASE WHEN B.CHRG_CTGRY = 'D' THEN SUM(A.USE_AMT) ELSE 0 END AS DC_AMT FROM TBLCH_CHRG A ,TPMPD_RATE_ITM B WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} /*INPUT*/
AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{pymAcntId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.CUST_ID = #{custId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD GROUP BY A.SO_ID, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.CTRT_ID, B.CHRG_CTGRY ) A WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY A.SO_ID, A.BILL_YYMM, A.BILL_CYCL, A.PYM_ACNT_ID, A.CUST_ID, A.CTRT_ID) TT

/*PaymentDistSearchMapper.getChargeDiscountInfoDetList*/
SELECT A.USE_YYMM /*사용년월*/ ,C.PROD_CD ,(SELECT PROD_NM FROM TPMPD_PROD WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID AND PROD_CD = C.PROD_CD) AS PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,B.RATE_ITM_NM /*할인과금항목명*/ ,DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(A.BILL_YYMM,'01'),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(A.USE_YYMM,'01'),'%Y-%m-%d')) AS STD_DD_CNT /*기준일수*/ ,TRUNCATE(A.USE_CNT, 0) AS USE_DD_CNT/*이용일수*/ ,TRUNCATE(A.USE_AMT, 0) AS DC_AMT/*할인금액*/ FROM TBLCH_CHRG A ,TPMPD_RATE_ITM B ,TCMCT_PROD_CMPS_INFO C WHERE 1=1
AND A.SO_ID = #{soId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.BILL_YYMM = #{billYymm} /*INPUT*/
AND A.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{pymAcntId} /*INPUT*/
AND A.CTRT_ID = #{ctrtId}
AND A.RATE_ITM_CD = B.RATE_ITM_CD AND B.CHRG_CTGRY = 'D' -- 할인항목 AND A.CTRT_ID = C.CTRT_ID AND C.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' AND A.PROD_CMPS_ID = C.PROD_CMPS_ID ORDER BY PROD_CD
